channel.title: My autotyper stopped working after update

item.title: My autotyper stopped working after update
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

That looks very detectable, old, and detectable.

The login procedures and username stuff can be simplified just like 10 lines, for loging in, all you need to do is use LoginPlayer; and SendKeysSilent is very very detectable in runescape i belive, using TypeSend types at a human speed and isn;t detectable. Your better of just making a new script because that one looks pretty bad.

Read full topic
item.source: My autotyper stopped working after update

item.title: My autotyper stopped working after update
item.dc:creator: @nukitsamees nukitsamees
item.description:
@nukitsamees wrote:

This script has been working for years, but few days ago it stopped. I dont care about autologin, Any ideas whats wrong with autotyper?

[code]//
//
//
// Start anywhere!
//
//
//
//ReLogon in under 30 secs!
//
// Needs a fast computer to work!
//
//
//

program YonisAutoChatPublic;
var
iyps, yonis2, x, y: Integer;
iyngn9o, hdfji2: string;
begin
iyngn9o:= readln(‘username for ReLogin:’);
hdfji2:= readln(‘password for Relogin:’);
while (True) do
begin

//Autochat
//Autochat
//autochat

//
// If your copying this into another script, remember to paste this: iyps, yonis2, x, y: Integer;
//
// Under that part where it says:
//
// program ;
// var
//

begin
iyps:= y;
yonis2:= x;
x:= 7;
y:= 304;

//6
begin
wait(1000);
SendKeysSilent(‘your text’);
SendKeysSilent(Chr(13));
Wait(800);
SendKeysSilent(‘your text’);
SendKeysSilent(Chr(13));
Wait(800);
SendKeysSilent(‘your text’);
SendKeysSilent(Chr(13));
Wait(800);
SendKeysSilent(‘your text’);
SendKeysSilent(Chr(13));
Wait(800);
SendKeysSilent(‘your text’);
SendKeysSilent(Chr(13));
Wait(800);
SendKeysSilent(‘your text’);
SendKeysSilent(Chr(13));
Wait(800);
SendKeysSilent(‘your text’);
SendKeysSilent(Chr(13));
Wait(800);
SendKeysSilent(‘your text’);
SendKeysSilent(Chr(13));
Wait(800);
SendKeysSilent(‘your text’);
SendKeysSilent(Chr(13));
Wait(800);
SendKeysSilent(‘your text’);
SendKeysSilent(Chr(13));
Wait(800);
SendKeysSilent(‘your text’);
SendKeysSilent(Chr(13));
Wait(800);
SendKeysSilent(‘your text’);
SendKeysSilent(Chr(13));
Wait(800);
end;

  begin

if(getcolor(73,336)=3328255)and(getcolor(19,338)=8084736)
then
clickmouse(149,338,true);
wait(1000)
end;

//Autochat
//Autochat
//Autochat

if(GetColor(88,145)=3472636)and
(GetColor(304,270)=8611678)and
(GetColor(260,242)=16777215)then
begin
ClickMouse(340,280,True);
Wait(2000);
ClickMouse(230,240,True);
Wait(500);
SendKeysSilent(iyngn9o);
Wait(2000);
ClickMouse(230,300,True);
Wait(200);
ClickMouse(230,300,True);
Wait(500);
SendKeysSilent(hdfji2);
Wait(2000);
ClickMouse(380,250,True);
Wait(6000);
ClickMouse(214,285,True);
end;
if(GetColor(56,117)=16777215)and
(GetColor(57,118)=0)and
(GetColor(455,216)=16777215)and
(GetColor(454,215)=0)
then
begin
ClickMouse(250,208,True);
Wait(5000);
end;
if(GetColor(87,146)=3472636)and
(GetColor(143,282)=0)and
(GetColor(464,244)=8808800)and
(GetColor(463,287)=10782074)
then
begin
ClickMouse(410,280,True);
wait(1000)
end;
end;
end;
end.

[/code]
